## ğŸ“ Quick Start

### Option 1: Vercel (Fastest)
```bash
npm i -g vercel
vercel
```

### Option 2: Local Server
```bash
# Windows
start.bat

# Mac/Linux
npm install --production
npm start
```

### Option 3: Docker
```bash
docker build -t podchemy-supreme .
docker run -p 3000:3000 podchemy-supreme
```
